articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The identity of the 15-year-old boy who killed Harvey Willgoose is protected due to his age.
articles.title: Harvey Willgoose's mum calls for killer to be named

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: More low-risk cancers could be monitored rather than treated, avoiding significant side effects, says a charity.
articles.title: Men being over-treated for prostate cancer, says charity

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: More than 50,000 North Koreans will be sent to work in Russia, as Moscow's war in Ukraine drains labour pools.
articles.title: North Koreans tell BBC they are sent to work 'like slaves' in Russia

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The EU says "the people of Ukraine must have the freedom to decide their future."
articles.title: Ukraine's borders must not be changed by force, EU leaders say

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Data suggests companies are not recruiting or are holding off replacing people who have left.
articles.title: UK job vacancies tumble across the board

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A government minister describes the number as "unacceptable" but says Labour is "making progress".
articles.title: Channel crossings to hit 50,000 since Labour came to power

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A survey finds nearly nine in 10 pharmacies have seen a surge in shoplifting in the past year.
articles.title: Pharmacies report surge in shoplifting and aggressive behaviour

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Dr Caroline Muirhead helped lead police to the spot where Tony Parsons had been buried after a confession from her boyfriend.
articles.title: Tony Parsons: How a Red Bull can helped solve mystery of missing cyclist

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Most tourists visiting Nepal head to Everest, which has seen overcrowding and increased pollution.
articles.title: Nepal makes 97 mountains free to climb as Everest fees rise

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Life of a Showgirl revealed as the popstar's latest album after intense speculation from fans.
articles.title: Taylor Swift announces new album on boyfriend Travis Kelce's podcast
